name: home-assistant-polymer
description: A frontend for Home Assistant using the Polymer framework

scripts.setup_js_dev: git submodule init && git submodule update && cd home-assistant-js && npm install
scripts.frontend_prod: npm run js_prod && npm run frontend_html
scripts.frontend_demo: npm run js_demo && npm run frontend_html
scripts.ru_all: npm run ru_core && npm run ru_demo
scripts.watch_ru_all: npm run watch_ru_core && npm run watch_ru_demo
scripts.lint_html: ls -1 src/**/*.html panels/**/*.html | xargs polymer lint --input
scripts.test: npm run lint_js && npm run lint_html

author: Paulus Schoutsen <Paulus@PaulusSchoutsen.nl> (http://paulusschoutsen.nl)
_depComment: keymirror, nuclear-js, object-assign, ha-js-ws are for ha-js
